activity_name: Record the data of each patient

substeps.description: Clerk initiates a new patient intake session within the hospital administration system
Clerk requests valid identification documents from the patient arriving at the registration desk
Clerk creates a blank digital patient profile to begin data entry

activity_name: Register the SSN of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk locates the Social Security Number field in the registration form
Clerk inputs the patient's unique Social Security Number
Clerk validates the SSN format to ensure it meets system requirements

activity_name: Register the Name of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk identifies the 'First Name' field in the database interface
Clerk types the patient's legal first name as it appears on their ID
Clerk confirms the spelling of the name with the patient

activity_name: Register the Surname of the patient

substeps.description: Clerk navigates to the 'Surname' (Last Name) field
Clerk inputs the patient's family name
Clerk verifies that the surname matches the provided identification
Clerk compiles the entered patient data to generate the Referral Document [cite: 2]
Clerk executes the print command for the generated document
Clerk retrieves the physical document from the printer
Clerk hands the printed referral to the patient for their records

activity_name: Archive the record in the file system

substeps.description: Clerk reviews the complete digital record for accuracy and completeness
Clerk executes the save command to commit the data
System writes the patient information into the database for long-term storage [cite: 2]
